title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via simple Python calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same REST wrapper as Python but for JS ecosystems.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); chat history, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, download models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline coding copilots; autocomplete and explain code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models for generative QA, summarization, or embedding in Haystack pipelines.

title: oll4ma
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with pipe-friendly JSON output; list, pull, delete, chat from scripts.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic Ruby to chat, generate, and manage local models.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose templates for Ollama plus optional GPU, Open WebUI, Postgres memory, and RAG stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapping Ollama REST calls; injectable services for chat, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API; tokio based.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, IAsyncEnumerable streaming, and dependency injection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines; reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Python Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; threaded replies, slash commands.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers; chat, image captions, and model hot-swap.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI assistance; summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, translate text via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models with autoscaling and batching for high-throughput serving.
